Package org.example

Class App

java.lang.Object
org.example.App
public class App extends Object
The main class of the application is for analyzing and creating a schedule of student progress.

    • analyzeGrades

      private static void analyzeGrades​(List<App.Student> students, FileOutputStream outputStream, String outputFileName) throws IOException
      Analysis of student performance.
      Parameters:
      students - the list of students for whom the performance analysis was carried out
      outputFileName - the output file with the results of the analysis
      outputStream - stream to write to the output file
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error has occurred

    • writeResultsToExcel

      private static void writeResultsToExcel​(FileOutputStream outputStream, String outputFileName, int countExcellent, int countGood, int countSatisfactory, int countFail, double maxGrade, double averageGrade, List<String> excellentStudents, List<String> goodStudents, List<String> satisfactoryStudents, List<String> failedStudents) throws IOException
      Writing students to a new file.
      Parameters:
      countExcellent - the number of excellent students.
      countGood - the number of good students.
      countSatisfactory - the number of triples.
      countFail - the number of students not admitted in the group.
      maxGrade - the maximum score from the group.
      averageGrade - average score from the whole group.
      excellentStudents - the list of excellent students.
      goodStudents - the list of good students.
      satisfactoryStudents - yhe list of triples students.
      failedStudents - the list of not admitted students.
      outputFileName - the output file with the results of the analysis.
      outputStream - stream to write to the output file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error has occurred

      Creating cells in the specified rows and columns and naming them.
      Parameters:
      row - the line in question.
      colNum - column number
      category - column names(categories).
      centeredStyle - a style for centering text.

    • addStudentListToColumn

      private static void addStudentListToColumn​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet, int startRow, int col, List<String> names, int maxRows)
      Adding the full names of the students to the required columns and rows.
      Parameters:
      sheet - list.
      startRow - line number.
      col - column number.
      names - list of students of a specific category.
      maxRows - maximum number of rows.

    • countStudentsWithGrade

      private static int countStudentsWithGrade​(List<App.Student> students, double grade)
      Counts the number of students with a given grade.
      Parameters:
      students - the list of students to be checked.
      grade - the assessment for which it is necessary to count the number of students.
      Returns:
      the number of students with the specified grade.
